flags.name: --minimum-assignment-count
flags.validation: Must be an integer >= 0; when paired with --maximum-assignment-count, must be <= maximum-assignment-count.

flags.name: --maximum-assignment-count
flags.validation: Must be an integer >= 0; when paired with --minimum-assignment-count, must be >= minimum-assignment-count.

flags.description: Maximum minutes to the start site.
flags.name: --maximum-minutes-to-start-site

flags.description: JSON array of material type constraints (snake_case keys).
flags.name: --material-type-constraints
flags.validation: Must be a valid JSON array. Example: [{"material_type_base_qualified_name":"soil","maximum_assignment_count":2}]. Use [] to clear.

flags.description: JSON array of trailer classification constraints (snake_case keys).
flags.name: --trailer-classification-constraints
flags.validation: Must be a valid JSON array. Example: [{"trailer_classification_id":"789","minimum_assignment_count":1,"maximum_assignment_count":2}]. Use [] to clear.

permissions: Allowed if the user is an admin or a manager member of the lineup scenario's broker (LineupScenarioPolicy create?; delegated through LineupScenarioTruckerPolicy).
side_effects: Creates a lineup scenario trucker record.
validation_notes: --lineup-scenario and --trucker are required. minimum-assignment-count and maximum-assignment-count must be integers >= 0; when both are set, minimum-assignment-count must be <= maximum-assignment-count. maximum-minutes-to-start-site must be an integer >= 0. material-type-constraints and trailer-classification-constraints, when provided, must be valid JSON arrays (use [] to clear). Trucker must belong to the same broker as the lineup scenario.
